author: Shaun Lintern, Shaun Lintern
title: Coronavirus: As infections hit one million worldwide, what do the statistics really tell us?
description: Crucial indicator for governments is rate at which virus is spreading within community and how quickly it doubles
content:
The number of people infected with coronavirus around the world has now passed the one million milestone, as the pandemic continues to grow and spread.
Around a quarter of the globe is now thought to be in some form of lockdown as restrictions on normal life… [+2653 chars]
